ISSUE.TITLE: use synthetic permalinks for like/share publishes on twitter, mastodon
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: currently we're only returning the URL of the liked/shared post. instead, we should generate and return the same synthetic like/share permalinks that we already use in other places, eg https://twitter.com/foo/status/123#liked-by-456 . [requested here](https://chat.indieweb.org/dev/2020-06-12#t1592000648266500) by @jalcine. thanks for the nudge!
